subject: Discrimination
World Cup (Soccer)
Women and Girls
Homosexuality
Coaches and Managers
Soccer
lead_paragraph: As Nigeria progressed toward the Women’s World Cup, which begins Sunday in Germany, its coach said that she has used religion in an attempt to rid her team of homosexual behavior.
snippet: As Nigeria progressed toward the Women’s World Cup, which begins Sunday in Germany, its coach said that she has used religion in an attempt to rid her team of homosexual behavior.
